column4: na obesiesie kwan edzi m’enyim: na EWURADZE a hom rohwehwɛ no no
column6: ahyɛmu no ho bɔfo a hom enyi gye no ho no

column2: "Na woana botum egyina ne mbae da no enyim? Na sɛ opue a
column3: woana botum egyina? Osiandɛ ɔtse dɛ namfo gya

column2: "na ɔbɛtsena ase dɛ dwetɛ namfo na yiyimufo
column4: na ɔapɔw hɔn ho dɛ sika na dwetɛ; na wɔdze ayɛyɛdze bɛma EWURADZE wɔ tsenenee mu."

column2: "Nna Juda na Jerusalɛm ayɛyɛdze bɔsɔ EWURADZE enyi dɛ kan nda no
"Na mebɛbɛn hom ebobu atsɛn; na mebɛyɛ ɔdasefo a no ho yɛ har etsia abayifo
column4: na ntanhunkafo; na hɔn a wodzi ɔpaanyi emim wɔ n’apaadze mu
column7: na wɔbɔ ɔhɔho enyi fi ne ndzinoa ho

column2: "Na emi EWURADZE mennsakyer; dɛm ntsi na hom
"Ofitsi hom egyanom nda do na hom adan efi m’ahyɛdze ho
column3: na hom enndzi do. Hom nsan mbra me nkyɛn
column5: dɔm EWURADZE na ɔse. Na hom bisa dɛ

column2: "Aso nyimpa bowia Nyame n’adze? Naaso hom wia me. Na hom bisa dɛ
column3: Ebɛnadze mu na yewia wo? Ebupɛn du na ayɛyɛdze mu a."

column2: "Wɔdze ndom adom hom; osiandɛ hom wia me
"Hom mfa ebupɛn du no nyina mbra adzekoradan no mu
column4: na hom mfa yi nsɔ me nhwɛ
column6: dɛ munnkobue sor ntokura ama hom
column7: na mehue nhyira ama hom a hom rinnya bea a ɔso a wɔdze bɛgye a."

column2: "Na mubotwuw ɔsɛɛfo no enyim wɔ hom ntsi
column3: na ɔnnkɛsɛɛ hom asaase do nduadzewa; eso hom wenyindua nnkɔpo no nsowee egu famu ansaana ne ber edu

column2: "Na amanaman nyina bɛfrɛ hom ahomkafo: osiandɛ hom bɛyɛ enyika asaase

column3: EWURADZE na ɔse. Naaso hom bisa dɛ
column4: Ebɛnadze mu na yɛakasa etsia wo?"

column3: Nyamesom yɛ kwa: na ebɛn mfaso na ɔyɛ dɛ yeedzi n’ahyɛdze do
column4: na yɛanantsew wɔ nnuho mu wɔ dɔm EWURADZE enyim?"

column2: "Na afei yɛfrɛ ɔhopɔwnyi dɛ ɔhomkanyi; ɛhɛɛ
column3: hɔn a wɔyɛ emumuyɛ no esi hɔn yie; nyew

column2: "Nna hɔn a wosuroo EWURADZE no kasaa kyerɛkyerɛɛ hɔnho: na EWURADZE kyɛɛn aso
column4: na wɔkyerɛɛw nkaa nwoma wɔ n’enyim maa hɔn a wosuroo EWURADZE
column5: na wɔdwendween ne dzin ho no."

column4: wɔ da a mebɛyɛ yi no mu
column5: mekyerɛ m’akoradze soronko; na mobɔfofɔw hɔn dɛ mbrɛ obi fofɔw ne ba a ɔsom no yie no."

column2: "Ɔno na hom bɛsan ebohu sorbi a ɔda tseneneenyi na mumuyɛnyi ntamu
column3: nyia ɔsom Nyankopɔn na nyia ɔnnsom no no ntamu."
